# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item, but a solution tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its unique features and the effort put into its development, we believe it's worth more than $150. Considering its high standards and benefits, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you today. Would you be interested in purchasing this product for $200? It's a fantastic opportunity to experience the best we have to offer at a special rate. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
